categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ath'en'terro, also known by his core name Thent, was a male Chiss sergeant in the Imperial Military of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was stationed on Hoth in the Dorn Base and provided Cipher Nine information on the whereabouts of Admiral Layek Davos.
